ActionEmail.name: Notification to a Workgroup
ActionEmail.description: This action informs a team that a ticket has been assigned their workgroup
ActionEmail.subject: The ticket $this->name()$, priority $this->label(priority)$ has been assigned to the workgroup $this->workgroup_name$
ActionEmail.body:
The ticket $this->name()$ has been assigned to the workgroup $this->workgroup_name$.

Description: $this->title$

Title: $this->title$

for more information on this ticket, click here: $this->hyperlink()$

ActionEmail.name: Notification to Agent
ActionEmail.description: This action informs an agent that a ticket has been assigned to her/him
ActionEmail.subject: The ticket $this->name()$, priority $this->label(priority)$ has been assigned to you
ActionEmail.body:
The ticket $this->name()$ has been assigned to you.

Description: $this->title$

Title: $this->title$

for more information on this ticket, click here: $this->hyperlink()$

ActionEmail.name: Notification to caller
ActionEmail.description: This action is used to inform the caller
ActionEmail.subject: Ticket $this->name()$, priority $this->label(priority)$ - $this->status$
ActionEmail.body:
The ticket $this->name()$ has changed to status $this->status$

Last update: $this->last_update$

for more information on this ticket, click here: $this->hyperlink(portal)$
